original_text: Peter sent all these women out of the room. He went down on his knees and he prayed to God. Then he turned his head towards the dead woman and he said, ‘Tabitha, stand up!’ She opened her eyes. When she saw Peter, she sat up.
korean_text: 베드로가 사람을 다 내보내고 무릎을 꿇고 기도하고 돌이켜 시체를 향하여 이르되 다비다야 일어나라 하니 그가 눈을 떠 베드로를 보고 일어나 앉는지라

sentences.original_text: Peter sent all these women out of the room.
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로가 이 모든 여자들을 방 밖으로 보냈다.

sentences.original_text: He went down on his knees
Then he turned his head towards the dead woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 죽은 여자 쪽으로 고개를 돌렸다.
